snippet: Law enforcement officials said they had arrested Mongolia’s former president on Friday, raiding a house in the capital after he refused a summons to answer questions about corruption charges.
abstract: Police officers arrest Mongolia's former president Enkhbayar Nambar for refusing to answer questions about corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: Law enforcement officials said they had arrested Mongolia’s former president on Friday, raiding a house in the capital after he refused a summons to answer questions about corruption charges.
